trans-unit.target: आणि [आम्ही पाठविले] ज्यांच्या बद्दल आम्ही आधी आपण संबंधित आहेत ज्यांच्या बद्दल [त्यांच्या कथा] दूत आणि दूतांना आपण संबंधित नाही.

trans-unit.source: [We sent] messengers as bringers of good tidings and warners so that mankind will have no argument against Allah after the messengers. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: जेणेकरून मानवजातीला दूत नंतर अल्लाह विरुद्ध कोणतेही मतभेद नाहीत लागेल चांगली बातमी आणि warners च्या bringers म्हणून दूत [आम्ही पाठविले].

trans-unit.source: But Allah bears witness to that which He has revealed to you. He has sent it down with His knowledge, and the angels bear witness [as well]. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.
trans-unit.target: पण अल्लाह तो तुम्हाला प्रकट केले आहे जे की साक्षीदार कोणी सोसायचा.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah have certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: खरंच, अल्लाह मार्ग विश्वास न ठेवणे आणि [लोक] निवारण जे नक्कीच लांब भरकटत गेलो.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and commit wrong [or injustice] - never will Allah forgive them, nor will He guide them to a path.
trans-unit.target: खरंच, विश्वास न ठेवणे आणि चूक झाली [किंवा अन्याय] पाप करतात - अल्लाह त्यांना क्षमा करणार नाही कधीच तो एक मार्ग त्यांना मार्गदर्शन करेल.

trans-unit.source: Except the path of Hell; they will abide therein forever. And that, for Allah, is [always] easy.
trans-unit.target: नरक मार्ग वगळता;

trans-unit.source: O Mankind, the Messenger has come to you with the truth from your Lord, so believe; it is better for you. But if you disbelieve - then indeed, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. And ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: देवा मानवजात, मेसेंजर आपल्या प्रभु सत्य तुम्हाला वेळ आली आहे, असे वाटत;

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, do not commit excess in your religion or say about Allah except the truth. The Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, was but a messenger of Allah and His word which He directed to Mary and a soul [created at a command] from Him. So believe in Allah and His messengers. And do not say, "Three"; desist - it is better for you. Indeed, Allah is but one God. Exalted is He above having a son. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: पवित्र शास्त्रातील देवा लोक आपला धर्म जादा पाप किंवा सत्य वगळता अल्लाह काय म्हणायचे नाही.

trans-unit.source: Never would the Messiah disdain to be a servant of Allah, nor would the angels near [to Him]. And whoever disdains His worship and is arrogant - He will gather them to Himself all together.
trans-unit.target: कधीही अल्लाह गुलाम ख्रिस्त तिरस्कार होईल, किंवा असे [त्याला] जवळ दूत आले.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, He will give them in full their rewards and grant them extra from His bounty. But as for those who disdained and were arrogant, He will punish them with a painful punishment, and they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: आणि ज्यांना नीतिमान कामे आणि विश्वास ठेवला आणि केले की, देवाने त्यांना त्यांचे बक्षिसे देणे आणि त्याच्या उदार अतिरिक्त त्यांना मंजूर होईल.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, there has come to you a conclusive proof from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.
trans-unit.target: देवा मानवजात, तेथे तुमचा प्रभु एक निर्णायक पुरावा तुमच्याकडे आले आहे, आणि आम्ही एक स्पष्ट प्रकाश खाली पाठवले आहे.

trans-unit.source: So those who believe in Allah and hold fast to Him - He will admit them to mercy from Himself and bounty and guide them to Himself on a straight path.
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे अल्लाह विश्वास आणि त्याला धरुन राहा ज्यांनी - तो स्वत: आणि उदार दया त्यांना देणे आणि सरळ मार्गावर स्वत: त्यांना मार्गदर्शन करेल.

trans-unit.source: They request from you a [legal] ruling. Say, "Allah gives you a ruling concerning one having neither descendants nor ascendants [as heirs]." If a man dies, leaving no child but [only] a sister, she will have half of what he left. And he inherits from her if she [dies and] has no child. But if there are two sisters [or more], they will have two-thirds of what he left. If there are both brothers and sisters, the male will have the share of two females. Allah makes clear to you [His law], lest you go astray. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: ते [कायदेशीर] निर्णयाची आपण विनंती करा.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fulfill [all] contracts. Lawful for you are the animals of grazing livestock except for that which is recited to you [in this Qur'an] - hunting not being permitted while you are in the state of ihram. Indeed, Allah ordains what He intends.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, [सर्व] करार पूर्ण कराल.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not violate the rites of Allah or [the sanctity of] the sacred month or [neglect the marking of] the sacrificial animals and garlanding [them] or [violate the safety of] those coming to the Sacred House seeking bounty from their Lord and [His] approval. But when you come out of ihram, then [you may] hunt. And do not let the hatred of a people for having obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram lead you to transgress. And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, अल्लाह संस्कार किंवा [पावित्र्य] पवित्र महिना किंवा अर्पण प्राणी [दुर्लक्ष चिन्हांकित] आणि पुष्पहार अर्पण [त्यांना] किंवा उल्लंघन करत नाहीत पवित्र हाऊस येत होते [सुरक्षा उल्लंघन]

trans-unit.source: Prohibited to you are dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah, and [those animals] killed by strangling or by a violent blow or by a head-long fall or by the goring of horns, and those from which a wild animal has eaten, except what you [are able to] slaughter [before its death], and those which are sacrificed on stone altars, and [prohibited is] that you seek decision through divining arrows. That is grave disobedience. This day those who disbelieve have despaired of [defeating] your religion; so fear them not, but fear Me. This day I have perfected for you your religion and completed My favor upon you and have approved for you Islam as religion. But whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: आपण मृत प्राणी, रक्त, स्वाइन मांस, की अल्लाह व्यतिरिक्त इतर समर्पित केले आहे, जे आहेत, आणि [त्या प्राणी] strangling किंवा हिंसक मोठा धक्का बसला आहे किंवा डोके-लांब गडी बाद होण्याचा क्रम करून किंवा कॅट्रिन गोरिंग करून ठार मारले प्रतिबंधित

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], what has been made lawful for them. Say, "Lawful for you are [all] good foods and [game caught by] what you have trained of hunting animals which you train as Allah has taught you. So eat of what they catch for you, and mention the name of Allah upon it, and fear Allah." Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: त्या [देवा मुहम्मद], त्यांना कायदेशीर केले गेले आहे काय विचारावे.

trans-unit.source: This day [all] good foods have been made lawful, and the food of those who were given the Scripture is lawful for you and your food is lawful for them. And [lawful in marriage are] chaste women from among the believers and chaste women from among those who were given the Scripture before you, when you have given them their due compensation, desiring chastity, not unlawful sexual intercourse or taking [secret] lovers. And whoever denies the faith - his work has become worthless, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: आज [सर्व] चांगले पदार्थ कायदेशीर केले गेले आहेत, आणि त्या पवित्र शास्त्र देण्यात आली अन्न आपण कायदेशीर आहे का, आणि आपल्या अन्न त्यांना योग्य नाही.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you rise to [perform] prayer, wash your faces and your forearms to the elbows and wipe over your heads and wash your feet to the ankles. And if you are in a state of janabah, then purify yourselves. But if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from the place of relieving himself or you have contacted women and do not find water, then seek clean earth and wipe over your faces and hands with it. Allah does not intend to make difficulty for you, but He intends to purify you and complete His favor upon you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: देवा आपण उठतील तेव्हा विश्वास ठेवला प्रार्थना [सुरू] दरिद्री आपल्या चेहरे आणि आपल्या forearms धुवा आणि आपल्या डोक्यावर पुसणे आणि गुडघ्यापर्यंत वर आपले पाय धुवा.

trans-unit.source: And remember the favor of Allah upon you and His covenant with which He bound you when you said, "We hear and we obey"; and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: आणि आपण सांगितले, "आम्ही ऐकू आणि आम्ही पालन" तू बांधले जे त्याचा करार यावर अल्लाह नावे लक्षात;

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm for Allah, witnesses in justice, and do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just. Be just; that is nearer to righteousness. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, न्याय अल्लाह खंबीर असे उभे साक्षीदार सक्तीने असेल आणि लोक द्वेष फक्त करण्यापासून प्रतिबंधित करू नका.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds [that] for them there is forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह विश्वास आणि [की] त्यांना क्षमा आणि चांगले फळ मिळते चांगल्या गोष्टी करतोस जे आश्वासन दिले आहे.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: पण विश्वास न ठेवणे आणि आमचे चिन्हे म्हणणारे - त्या नरकयातना साथीदार आहेत.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when a people determined to extend their hands [in aggression] against you, but He withheld their hands from you; and fear Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला लोक तुमच्यावर हल्ला [आगळीक मध्ये] आपले हात वाढवायचे ठरविले, पण तो आपण आपले हात ठेवले, पुन्हा तू अल्लाह नावे लक्षात;

trans-unit.source: And Allah had already taken a covenant from the Children of Israel, and We delegated from among them twelve leaders. And Allah said, "I am with you. If you establish prayer and give zakah and believe in My messengers and support them and loan Allah a goodly loan, I will surely remove from you your misdeeds and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow. But whoever of you disbelieves after that has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way."
trans-unit.target: आणि अल्लाह आधीच इस्राएल लोकांच्या करार घेतला होता आणि आम्ही त्यांना बारा नेते पासून प्रातिनिधिक.

trans-unit.source: So for their breaking of the covenant We cursed them and made their hearts hard. They distort words from their [proper] usages and have forgotten a portion of that of which they were reminded. And you will still observe deceit among them, except a few of them. But pardon them and overlook [their misdeeds]. Indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे करार त्यांच्या ब्रेकिंग आम्ही त्यांना शाप दिला हार्ड त्यांच्या अंत: करणात केले.

trans-unit.source: And from those who say, "We are Christians" We took their covenant; but they forgot a portion of that of which they were reminded. So We caused among them animosity and hatred until the Day of Resurrection. And Allah is going to inform them about what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: आणि जो कोणी, आम्ही त्यांच्या करार घेतला "आम्ही ख्रिस्ती आहेत" त्या;

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, there has come to you Our Messenger making clear to you much of what you used to conceal of the Scripture and overlooking much. There has come to you from Allah a light and a clear Book.
trans-unit.target: पवित्र शास्त्रातील देवा लोक, आमच्या मेसेंजर आपण पवित्र शास्त्रातील दडवणे आणि जास्त जवळ काय उपयोग जास्त स्पष्ट करुन आपण आली आहे.

trans-unit.source: By which Allah guides those who pursue His pleasure to the ways of peace and brings them out from darknesses into the light, by His permission, and guides them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: जे अल्लाह शांती मार्ग त्याच्या सुख पाठलाग करणाऱ्या त्या मार्गदर्शन आणि त्यांना तो बाहेर darknesses त्याच्या परवानगीने द्वारे, प्रकाश मध्ये आणते, आणि एक सरळ मार्ग त्यांना मार्गदर्शन केले जाते.

trans-unit.source: They have certainly disbelieved who say that Allah is Christ, the son of Mary. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He had intended to destroy Christ, the son of Mary, or his mother or everyone on the earth?" And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them. He creates what He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: ते नक्कीच विश्वास ठेवला नाही आहे अल्लाह ख्रिस्त मरीया पुत्र आहे असे म्हणता.

trans-unit.source: But the Jews and the Christians say, "We are the children of Allah and His beloved." Say, "Then why does He punish you for your sins?" Rather, you are human beings from among those He has created. He forgives whom He wills, and He punishes whom He wills. And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, and to Him is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: यहूदी आणि ख्रिस्ती लोक म्हणतात, "आम्ही अल्लाह आणि त्याच्या प्रिय मुले आहेत."

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, there has come to you Our Messenger to make clear to you [the religion] after a period [of suspension] of messengers, lest you say, "There came not to us any bringer of good tidings or a warner." But there has come to you a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: पवित्र शास्त्रातील देवा लोक, आपण आमच्या मेसेंजर [निलंबन] दूत काही काळानंतर आपण [धर्म] ते स्पष्ट करण्यासाठी असे तुम्ही म्हणू अपेक्षा आहे, 'तेथे आम्हाला नाही चांगली बातमी किंवा वॉर्नर कोणत्याही bringer आले

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, remember the favor of Allah upon you when He appointed among you prophets and made you possessors and gave you that which He had not given anyone among the worlds.
trans-unit.target: आणि [उल्लेख देवा, मुहम्मद], तेव्हा मोशे आपल्या लोकांना म्हणाला, "माझ्या लोकांनो, तो तुम्ही संदेष्ट्यांना नियुक्त आणि आपण जमीन केले आणि तो जगातील कोणी दिले नसते जे आपण दिले तेव्हा तुम्हाला अल्लाह नावे लक्षात

trans-unit.source: O my people, enter the Holy Land which Allah has assigned to you and do not turn back [from fighting in Allah 's cause] and [thus] become losers."
trans-unit.target: माझ्या लोकांनो, पवित्र भूमी अल्लाह आपल्यासाठी नियुक्त आणि [अशा प्रकारे] मोठे नुकसान सहन करावे झाले [अल्लाह च्या कारण मध्ये लढाई पासून] परत नाही आहे प्रविष्ट करा. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, indeed within it is a people of tyrannical strength, and indeed, we will never enter it until they leave it; but if they leave it, then we will enter."
trans-unit.target: ते म्हणाले, "हे अत्याचारी शक्ती लोक खरंच आत, आणि खरंच, ते सोडून होईपर्यंत आम्ही तेथे कधीही प्रवेश होणार मोशे, तू. पण ते सोडून तर आम्ही प्रवेश करणार म्हणाला,"

trans-unit.source: Said two men from those who feared [to disobey] upon whom Allah had bestowed favor, "Enter upon them through the gate, for when you have entered it, you will be predominant. And upon Allah rely, if you should be believers."
trans-unit.target: म्हणाला, [मोडण्याची] अल्लाह लोकांवर नावे बहाल केली होती, भय बाळगणारा होता त्या दोन पुरुष "तुमचे तारण हवे असेल तर, दरवाजाने त्यांना शिक्षा प्रविष्ट करा, आपल्याला प्रविष्ट तेव्हा, आपण प्रबळ होईल. आणि अल्लाह यावर, अवलंबून असतात."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, indeed we will not enter it, ever, as long as they are within it; so go, you and your Lord, and fight. Indeed, we are remaining right here."
trans-unit.target: ते म्हणाले, "मोशेने देवा, खरंच आम्ही, जोपर्यंत ते तो आत आहेत म्हणून प्रवेश करणार नाहीत कधी,.. त्यामुळे आपण व आपल्या प्रभु जा आणि लढा खरंच, आम्ही इथे उर्वरित आहेत"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "My Lord, indeed I do not possess except myself and my brother, so part us from the defiantly disobedient people."
trans-unit.target: [मोशेला] म्हणाला, "माझा प्रभु, खरंच मी स्वत: आणि माझा भाऊ वगळता नसतील, त्यामुळे defiantly आज्ञा न मानणारे लोक आम्हाला भाग."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then indeed, it is forbidden to them for forty years [in which] they will wander throughout the land. So do not grieve over the defiantly disobedient people."
trans-unit.target: [अल्लाह] म्हणाला, "मग, खरंच, तो चाळीस वर्षे ते देशभर भटकतील [जे]. त्यामुळे defiantly आज्ञा न मानणारे लोकांना दु: ख नाही त्यांना निषिद्ध आहे."

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the story of Adam's two sons, in truth, when they both offered a sacrifice [to Allah], and it was accepted from one of them but was not accepted from the other. Said [the latter], "I will surely kill you." Said [the former], "Indeed, Allah only accepts from the righteous [who fear Him].
trans-unit.target: आणि त्यांना आदामाच्या दोन मुलगे कथा, सत्य, ते दोन्ही [अल्लाह] एक यज्ञ केला आणि ती एक स्वीकारले होते पण इतर स्वीकारण्यात आले नाही, तेव्हा कथन.

trans-unit.source: If you should raise your hand against me to kill me - I shall not raise my hand against you to kill you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: आपण आपल्या हातात व्हावीत तर मला मारुन माझ्या विरुध्द - आपण काही तुम्हांला जिवे मारण्याचा विरुद्ध मी हात नाही.

trans-unit.source: Indeed I want you to obtain [thereby] my sin and your sin so you will be among the companions of the Fire. And that is the recompense of wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: [ज्यामुळे] खरंच मी तुम्हाला प्राप्त करू इच्छित माझ्या पापांची आणि तुमच्या पापाबद्दल तुम्हाला फायर साथीदार असणार आहे.

trans-unit.source: And his soul permitted to him the murder of his brother, so he killed him and became among the losers.
trans-unit.target: आणि त्याचे आयुष्य त्याचा भाऊ खून त्याला परवानगी, त्यामुळे त्याने ठार केले आणि अपयशी आपापसांत झाले.

trans-unit.source: Then Allah sent a crow searching in the ground to show him how to hide the disgrace of his brother. He said, "O woe to me! Have I failed to be like this crow and hide the body of my brother?" And he became of the regretful.
trans-unit.target: मग अल्लाह कसे आपला भाऊ कलंक लपविण्यासाठी त्याला दाखवून ग्राउंड मध्ये शोध कावळा पाठविले.

trans-unit.source: Because of that, We decreed upon the Children of Israel that whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption [done] in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely. And whoever saves one - it is as if he had saved mankind entirely. And our messengers had certainly come to them with clear proofs. Then indeed many of them, [even] after that, throughout the land, were transgressors.
trans-unit.target: जणू काय तो पूर्णपणे मानवजातीला ठार मारले तो आहे - कारण की, आम्ही देशात [केले] इस्राएल लोकांनो तोपर्यंत एक आत्मा किंवा भ्रष्टाचार एक आत्मा ठार की, जो कोणी यावर हुकूम.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the penalty for those who wage war against Allah and His Messenger and strive upon earth [to cause] corruption is none but that they be killed or crucified or that their hands and feet be cut off from opposite sides or that they be exiled from the land. That is for them a disgrace in this world; and for them in the Hereafter is a great punishment,
trans-unit.target: खरंच, अल्लाह आणि त्याच्या मेसेंजर विरुद्ध युद्ध पुकारणे आणि पृथ्वीवर प्रयत्नांची पराकाष्ठा ज्यांना दंड [होऊ] भ्रष्टाचार नाही आहे, पण ठार किंवा खिळण्याची किंवा त्यांचे हात पाय उलट बाजू बाहेर काढून टाकावे की ते हद्दपार करावे, अशी

trans-unit.source: Except for those who return [repenting] before you apprehend them. And know that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [पश्चात्ताप] परत आपण त्यात पकडणे आधी त्या वगळता.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and seek the means [of nearness] to Him and strive in His cause that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, अल्लाह भीती आणि त्याला [nearness च्या] अर्थ शोधतात आणि आपण यशस्वी यासाठी की, कारण मध्ये प्रयत्न करतो.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve - if they should have all that is in the earth and the like of it with it by which to ransom themselves from the punishment of the Day of Resurrection, it will not be accepted from them, and for them is a painful punishment
trans-unit.target: खरंच, विश्वास न ठेवणे ज्यांनी - लोक पुनरुत्थानाच्या दिवशी शिक्षा खंडणी स्वत: ला, तो त्यांना स्वीकारले जाणार नाही तो पृथ्वीवर आहे आणि तो जसे सर्व असणे आवश्यक आहे तर, आणि त्यांना एक आहे

trans-unit.source: They will wish to get out of the Fire, but never are they to emerge therefrom, and for them is an enduring punishment.
trans-unit.target: ते फायर बाहेर जायचे, पण ते पापात दिसणे आहेत नाही, आणि त्यांना एक टिकाऊ शिक्षा आहे.

trans-unit.source: [As for] the thief, the male and the female, amputate their hands in recompense for what they committed as a deterrent [punishment] from Allah. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: [म्हणून] चोर, नर व मादी, ते एक निवारक [शिक्षा] अल्लाह पासून म्हणून बांधील काय भरपाई आपले हात कापून काढणे.

trans-unit.source: But whoever repents after his wrongdoing and reforms, indeed, Allah will turn to him in forgiveness. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: पण त्याला आपल्या चुकीची आणि आर्थिक सुधारणा नंतर पश्चात्ताप जो कोणी, खरंच, अल्लाह त्याला क्षमा चालू होईल.

trans-unit.source: Do you not know that to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth? He punishes whom He wills and forgives whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: आपण अल्लाह की आकाश व पृथ्वी च्या सत्ता मालकीचे माहीत नाही का?

trans-unit.source: O Messenger, let them not grieve you who hasten into disbelief of those who say, "We believe" with their mouths, but their hearts believe not, and from among the Jews. [They are] avid listeners to falsehood, listening to another people who have not come to you. They distort words beyond their [proper] usages, saying "If you are given this, take it; but if you are not given it, then beware." But he for whom Allah intends fitnah - never will you possess [power to do] for him a thing against Allah. Those are the ones for whom Allah does not intend to purify their hearts. For them in this world is disgrace, and for them in the Hereafter is a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: देवा, मेसेंजर, त्यांना ते म्हणतात, 'त्यांचे तोंड "आम्ही" या अविश्वास मध्ये लक्ष ठेवत आहे कोण तुम्ही दु: खी नाही, परंतु त्यांच्या अंत: करणात विश्वास ठेवला नाही, आणि यहूदी लोकांत आहे.

trans-unit.source: [They are] avid listeners to falsehood, devourers of [what is] unlawful. So if they come to you, [O Muhammad], judge between them or turn away from them. And if you turn away from them - never will they harm you at all. And if you judge, judge between them with justice. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.
trans-unit.target: खोट्या गोष्टींवर हपापलेला श्रोत्यांना [ते आहेत], या devourers [काय आहे] बेकायदेशीर.

trans-unit.source: But how is it that they come to you for judgement while they have the Torah, in which is the judgement of Allah? Then they turn away, [even] after that; but those are not [in fact] believers.
trans-unit.target: पण हे कसं ते नियमशास्त्र आहेत, तर न्याय तुमच्याकडे येतात जे अल्लाह न्याय आहे का?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent down the Torah, in which was guidance and light. The prophets who submitted [to Allah] judged by it for the Jews, as did the rabbis and scholars by that with which they were entrusted of the Scripture of Allah, and they were witnesses thereto. So do not fear the people but fear Me, and do not exchange My verses for a small price. And whoever does not judge by what Allah has revealed - then it is those who are the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: खरंच, आम्ही मार्गदर्शन आणि प्रकाश होता नियमशास्त्र, खाली पाठविले.

trans-unit.source: And We ordained for them therein a life for a life, an eye for an eye, a nose for a nose, an ear for an ear, a tooth for a tooth, and for wounds is legal retribution. But whoever gives [up his right as] charity, it is an expiation for him. And whoever does not judge by what Allah has revealed - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: आणि आम्ही त्यांना त्यात एक जीवन जीवन निवडले, एक डोळा एक डोळा, एक नाक एक नाक, कान संगिताची आवड, दाताबद्दल दात, आणि जखमा कायदेशीर बदला आहे.

trans-unit.source: And We sent, following in their footsteps, Jesus, the son of Mary, confirming that which came before him in the Torah; and We gave him the Gospel, in which was guidance and light and confirming that which preceded it of the Torah as guidance and instruction for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: आणि आम्ही त्यांच्या पावलावर पाऊल येशू मरीया मुलगा पुढील, पाठविले नियमशास्त्र त्याला आधी आला, याची पुष्टी;

trans-unit.source: And let the People of the Gospel judge by what Allah has revealed therein. And whoever does not judge by what Allah has revealed - then it is those who are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: आणि काय अल्लाह त्यात उघड झाले आहे गॉस्पेल न्यायाधीश लोक द्या.

trans-unit.source: And We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], the Book in truth, confirming that which preceded it of the Scripture and as a criterion over it. So judge between them by what Allah has revealed and do not follow their inclinations away from what has come to you of the truth. To each of you We prescribed a law and a method. Had Allah willed, He would have made you one nation [united in religion], but [He intended] to test you in what He has given you; so race to [all that is] good. To Allah is your return all together, and He will [then] inform you concerning that over which you used to differ.
trans-unit.target: आणि आम्ही तुला हे प्रगट केले आहे, [हे मुहम्मद], सत्य पुस्तक, पवित्र शास्त्रातील आणि तो एक निकष म्हणून तो अगोदर जे खात्री केली.

trans-unit.source: And judge, [O Muhammad], between them by what Allah has revealed and do not follow their inclinations and beware of them, lest they tempt you away from some of what Allah has revealed to you. And if they turn away - then know that Allah only intends to afflict them with some of their [own] sins. And indeed, many among the people are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: न्यायाधीश [तू मुहम्मद], त्यांना अल्लाह उघड आणि त्यांच्या प्रवृत्ती अनुसरण आणि त्यांना स्वत: चे रक्षण नाही ते अल्लाह तुम्हाला प्रकट केले आहे काय काही दूर परीक्षा नये आहे काय दरम्यान आहे.

trans-unit.source: Then is it the judgement of [the time of] ignorance they desire? But who is better than Allah in judgement for a people who are certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: मग तो ते इच्छा अज्ञान [वेळ] न्याय आहे?

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not take the Jews and the Christians as allies. They are [in fact] allies of one another. And whoever is an ally to them among you - then indeed, he is [one] of them. Indeed, Allah guides not the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, यहूदी व ख्रिस्ती मित्रराष्ट्र म्हणून घेऊ नका.

trans-unit.source: So you see those in whose hearts is disease hastening into [association with] them, saying, "We are afraid a misfortune may strike us." But perhaps Allah will bring conquest or a decision from Him, and they will become, over what they have been concealing within themselves, regretful.
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे आपण ज्या अंत: करणात त्या रोग [संयुक्त विद्यमाने] मध्ये घाई त्यांना तो म्हणाला, पाहतील, "आम्ही एक दुर्दैव आम्हाला तडाखा शकते घाबरत आहेत."

trans-unit.source: And those who believe will say, "Are these the ones who swore by Allah their strongest oaths that indeed they were with you?" Their deeds have become worthless, and they have become losers.
trans-unit.target: आणि जे विश्वास ठेवतात म्हणेल, त्या "अल्लाह खरंच ते तुमच्याबरोबर होतो की त्यांच्या कडक शपथ शपथ घेतली कोण या विषयावर आहेस काय?"

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, whoever of you should revert from his religion - Allah will bring forth [in place of them] a people He will love and who will love Him [who are] humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: तू त्याचा धर्म तुम्हांला जो कोणी परत पाहिजे, विश्वास ठेवला - अल्लाह लोक तो प्रेम करील [त्यांना जागी] देईल आणि त्याला प्रेम करेल [कोण आहेत] विश्वासणारे दिशेने नम्र, disbelievers विरुद्ध शक्तिशाली;

trans-unit.source: Your ally is none but Allah and [therefore] His Messenger and those who have believed - those who establish prayer and give zakah, and they bow [in worship].
trans-unit.target: आपले घटक पण अल्लाह आणि [म्हणून] त्याच्या मेसेंजर कोणीही नाही आणि ज्यांनी विश्वास ठेवला आहे - प्रार्थना स्थापना करणे आणि zakah देतील, आणि ते [उपासना] नमन त्या.

trans-unit.source: And whoever is an ally of Allah and His Messenger and those who have believed - indeed, the party of Allah - they will be the predominant.
trans-unit.target: आणि अल्लाह आणि त्याच्या मेसेंजर एक घटक पक्ष जो कोणी आहे आणि ज्यांना विश्वास ठेवला आहे - खरंच, अल्लाह पक्ष - ते प्रबळ होईल.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, take not those who have taken your religion in ridicule and amusement among the ones who were given the Scripture before you nor the disbelievers as allies. And fear Allah, if you should [truly] be believers.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला नाही ज्यांना विषयावर आपण किंवा मित्रराष्ट्र म्हणून disbelievers आधी पवित्र शास्त्र देण्यात आली आपापसांत उपहास आणि करमणुकीचे साधन मध्ये आपला धर्म घेतले आहेत घ्या.

trans-unit.source: And when you call to prayer, they take it in ridicule and amusement. That is because they are a people who do not use reason.
trans-unit.target: आणि आपण प्रार्थना करतो तेव्हा ते उपहास आणि मनोरंजन करतात.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O People of the Scripture, do you resent us except [for the fact] that we have believed in Allah and what was revealed to us and what was revealed before and because most of you are defiantly disobedient?"
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "पवित्र शास्त्रातील देवा लोक, आपण आम्हाला [खरं] ते आम्हाला प्रकट केला होता आम्ही अल्लाह विश्वास ठेवला आहे आणि आणि आपण सर्वात defiantly धरीत नाहीत कारण काय आधी प्रकट होते आणि वगळता इथं काय आहे? '

trans-unit.source: Say, "Shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that as penalty from Allah? [It is that of] those whom Allah has cursed and with whom He became angry and made of them apes and pigs and slaves of Taghut. Those are worse in position and further astray from the sound way."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "मी अल्लाह पासून दंड म्हणून की वाईट [काय आहे] तुम्हाला माहिती का? अल्लाह ज्याला वाईट आहे आणि ज्यांच्याशी तो रागावला आणि जनावरे यांचा नवा साठा आणि Taghut डुकरांना आणि गुलाम त्यांना तयार केलेल्या [हे आहे]. त्या

trans-unit.source: And when they come to you, they say, "We believe." But they have entered with disbelief [in their hearts], and they have certainly left with it. And Allah is most knowing of what they were concealing.
trans-unit.target: आणि ते आपण आल्यावर ते म्हणाले, "आम्हाला विश्वास आहे."

trans-unit.source: And you see many of them hastening into sin and aggression and the devouring of [what is] unlawful. How wretched is what they have been doing.
trans-unit.target: आणि आपण त्यांना अनेक पाप आणि आक्रमकता आणि [काय आहे] च्या भस्म बेकायदेशीर मध्ये घाई पहा.

trans-unit.source: Why do the rabbis and religious scholars not forbid them from saying what is sinful and devouring what is unlawful? How wretched is what they have been practicing.
trans-unit.target: का rabbis आणि धार्मिक विद्वान काय पापी आहे तो आणि बेकायदेशीर आहे काय करणाऱ्या धगधगत्या पासून त्यांना मना करू नका?

trans-unit.source: And the Jews say, "The hand of Allah is chained." Chained are their hands, and cursed are they for what they say. Rather, both His hands are extended; He spends however He wills. And that which has been revealed to you from your Lord will surely increase many of them in transgression and disbelief. And We have cast among them animosity and hatred until the Day of Resurrection. Every time they kindled the fire of war [against you], Allah extinguished it. And they strive throughout the land [causing] corruption, and Allah does not like corrupters.
trans-unit.target: आणि यहूदी लोक म्हणतात, "अल्लाह हात बांधले गेले आहे."

trans-unit.source: And if only the People of the Scripture had believed and feared Allah, We would have removed from them their misdeeds and admitted them to Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: अशा रीतीने पवित्र शास्त्र फक्त लोक विश्वास ठेवला आणि अल्लाह भीती वाटली होती, तर आम्ही त्यांच्या अगर बहीण यांना त्यांना काढले आणि सुख गार्डन त्यांना दाखल करण्यात आले आहे.

trans-unit.source: And if only they upheld [the law of] the Torah, the Gospel, and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would have consumed [provision] from above them and from beneath their feet. Among them are a moderate community, but many of them - evil is that which they do.
trans-unit.target: आणि फक्त ते नियमशास्त्र, गॉस्पेल, [नियम] समर्थन तर आणि त्यांच्या प्रभु पासून त्यांना काय प्रकट केले आहे, त्यांना वरून पाय खाली पासून [तरतूद] नाश होईल.

trans-unit.source: O Messenger, announce that which has been revealed to you from your Lord, and if you do not, then you have not conveyed His message. And Allah will protect you from the people. Indeed, Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: तू मेसेंजर, आपल्या प्रभू तुम्हांला तुमच्या प्रकट करण्यात आले आहे जे घोषित करतात, आणि आपण नाही तर, नंतर आपण त्याचा संदेश सांगितले नाही.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O People of the Scripture, you are [standing] on nothing until you uphold [the law of] the Torah, the Gospel, and what has been revealed to you from your Lord." And that which has been revealed to you from your Lord will surely increase many of them in transgression and disbelief. So do not grieve over the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: "तुला आधार पर्यंत नियमशास्त्र, गॉस्पेल, [नियम] आणि आपल्या प्रभू तुम्हांला तुमच्या प्रकट करण्यात आले आहे काहीही पवित्र शास्त्रातील देवा लोक, आपण [स्थायी] आहे." म्हणा,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed [in Prophet Muhammad] and those [before Him] who were Jews or Sabeans or Christians - those [among them] who believed in Allah and the Last Day and did righteousness - no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: खरंच, ज्यांना [प्रेषित मुहम्मद मध्ये] विश्वास ठेवला आहे आणि [त्याच्या समोर] त्या यहूदी लोकांना किंवा श्रीमंत किंवा ख्रिस्ती होते - [त्यापैकी] त्या अल्लाह आणि अंतिम दिवस विश्वास ठेवला आहे आणि चांगले आहे केले - भय नाही तेथे त्यांना यासंबंधी जाईल,

trans-unit.source: We had already taken the covenant of the Children of Israel and had sent to them messengers. Whenever there came to them a messenger with what their souls did not desire, a party [of messengers] they denied, and another party they killed.
trans-unit.target: आम्ही आधीच इस्राएल लोकांनो कराराचा घेतले आणि दूत त्यांना पाठवले होते.

trans-unit.source: And they thought there would be no [resulting] punishment, so they became blind and deaf. Then Allah turned to them in forgiveness; then [again] many of them became blind and deaf. And Allah is Seeing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: आणि ते असे काही नाही मागितले [परिणामी] त्या दोघांना शिक्षा व्हावी विचार, म्हणून ते आंधळे, बहिरे झाले.

trans-unit.source: They have certainly disbelieved who say, "Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary" while the Messiah has said, "O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord." Indeed, he who associates others with Allah - Allah has forbidden him Paradise, and his refuge is the Fire. And there are not for the wrongdoers any helpers.
trans-unit.target: ते नक्कीच विश्वास ठेवला नाही आहे कोण म्हणतात, "अल्लाह मशीहा, मरीया मुलगा आहे", तर ख्रिस्त म्हणाला, "इस्राएलच्या लोकांनो, अल्लाह, माझा प्रभू आणि आपल्या प्रभु त्याचीच उपासना."

trans-unit.source: They have certainly disbelieved who say, "Allah is the third of three." And there is no god except one God. And if they do not desist from what they are saying, there will surely afflict the disbelievers among them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: ते नक्कीच विश्वास ठेवला नाही आहे कोण म्हणतात, "अल्लाह तीन तिसऱ्या क्रमांकावर आहे."

trans-unit.source: So will they not repent to Allah and seek His forgiveness? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे ते अल्लाह पश्चात्ताप आणि त्याचा क्षमा इच्छितो नाही काय?

trans-unit.source: The Messiah, son of Mary, was not but a messenger; [other] messengers have passed on before him. And his mother was a supporter of truth. They both used to eat food. Look how We make clear to them the signs; then look how they are deluded.
trans-unit.target: ख्रिस्त, मरीया मुलगा, पण एक दूत नव्हता;

trans-unit.source: Say, "Do you worship besides Allah that which holds for you no [power of] harm or benefit while it is Allah who is the Hearing, the Knowing?"
trans-unit.target: जसे की, "आपण अल्लाह याशिवाय उपासना तो अल्लाह कोण ऐकतो, कारण तुला माहीत आहे, तर आपण वस्तू ज्या काही वाईट किंवा लाभ [शक्ती] की आहे का?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "O People of the Scripture, do not exceed limits in your religion beyond the truth and do not follow the inclinations of a people who had gone astray before and misled many and have strayed from the soundness of the way."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "पवित्र शास्त्रातील देवा लोक, सत्य पलीकडे आपल्या धर्मात मर्यादा ओलांडत नाही आणि पूर्वी चुकीच्या मार्गाने गेले होते व अनेक दिशाभूल आणि मार्ग बरा पासून भटकलेल्यांना लोक प्रवृत्तींचे अनुसरण नाही."

trans-unit.source: Cursed were those who disbelieved among the Children of Israel by the tongue of David and of Jesus, the son of Mary. That was because they disobeyed and [habitually] transgressed.
trans-unit.target: शापित असो दावीद केलीत आणि येशू मरीया मुलगा इस्राएल लोकांमध्ये विश्वासामुळेच ज्या लोकांनी होते.

trans-unit.source: They used not to prevent one another from wrongdoing that they did. How wretched was that which they were doing.
trans-unit.target: ते केले विरुद्ध काही चुकीच्या गोष्टी पासून आणखी एक टाळण्यासाठी नाही वापरले.

trans-unit.source: You see many of them becoming allies of those who disbelieved. How wretched is that which they have put forth for themselves in that Allah has become angry with them, and in the punishment they will abide eternally.
trans-unit.target: आपण त्यांना अनेक विश्वास ठेवला नाही जे सहयोगी होत पाहू.

trans-unit.source: And if they had believed in Allah and the Prophet and in what was revealed to him, they would not have taken them as allies; but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: आणि ते अल्लाह आणि प्रेषित आणि त्याला प्रकट केला होता काय विश्वास ठेवला असते, तर त्यांनी मित्रराष्ट्र म्हणून त्यांना नसता;

trans-unit.source: You will surely find the most intense of the people in animosity toward the believers [to be] the Jews and those who associate others with Allah; and you will find the nearest of them in affection to the believers those who say, "We are Christians." That is because among them are priests and monks and because they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: आपण खात्रीने विश्वासणारे [करणे] यहूदी लोक आणि यहूदी दिशेने खुन्नस लोकांना सर्वात प्रखर सापडेल अल्लाह इतर संबंधित ज्यांनी;

trans-unit.source: And when they hear what has been revealed to the Messenger, you see their eyes overflowing with tears because of what they have recognized of the truth. They say, "Our Lord, we have believed, so register us among the witnesses.
trans-unit.target: आणि ते मेसेंजर प्रकट करण्यात आले आहे काय ऐकू तेव्हा, आपण कारण त्यांनी सत्यावर ओळखले आहे काय अश्रू भरून आले त्यांचे डोळे पहा.

trans-unit.source: And why should we not believe in Allah and what has come to us of the truth? And we aspire that our Lord will admit us [to Paradise] with the righteous people."
trans-unit.target: आणि का आम्ही अल्लाह विश्वास करू नये आणि काय सत्य आम्हाला आले आहेत?

trans-unit.source: So Allah rewarded them for what they said with gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of doers of good.
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे अल्लाह ते [नंदनवनात] नद्या वाहतील जे खाली गार्डन्स, ते सर्वकाळ राहू ज्यात म्हटले आहे काय त्यांना देईल.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieved and denied Our signs - they are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: पण विश्वास ठेवला नाही आणि आमचे चिन्हे नाकारला जे - ते नरकयातना साथीदार आहेत.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not prohibit the good things which Allah has made lawful to you and do not transgress. Indeed, Allah does not like transgressors.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, अल्लाह तुम्हाला कायदेशीर केले आणि पाप नाही आहे चांगल्या गोष्टी मनाई करणे नाही.

trans-unit.source: And eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And fear Allah, in whom you are believers.
trans-unit.target: आणि अल्लाह [आहे] तुम्हांला दिल्या आहे काय कायदेशीर आणि चांगले खा.

trans-unit.source: Allah will not impose blame upon you for what is meaningless in your oaths, but He will impose blame upon you for [breaking] what you intended of oaths. So its expiation is the feeding of ten needy people from the average of that which you feed your [own] families or clothing them or the freeing of a slave. But whoever cannot find [or afford it] - then a fast of three days [is required]. That is the expiation for oaths when you have sworn. But guard your oaths. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह लोकांशी मैत्री मध्ये निरर्थक आहे काय तुम्हाला दोष लादणे करणार नाही, पण तो [ब्रेकिंग] आपण तोच हेतू काय आपण यावर दोष लादणे असेल.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, indeed, intoxicants, gambling, [sacrificing on] stone alters [to other than Allah], and divining arrows are but defilement from the work of Satan, so avoid it that you may be successful.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, [अल्लाह वगळता] खरंच, intoxicants, जुगार, [वर बळी अर्पण] दगड बदलते, आणि divining बाण आहेत पण सैतान च्या काम भ्रष्ट, त्यामुळे आपण यशस्वी होऊ शकतो की तो टाळण्यासाठी.

trans-unit.source: Satan only wants to cause between you animosity and hatred through intoxicants and gambling and to avert you from the remembrance of Allah and from prayer. So will you not desist?
trans-unit.target: सैतान फक्त intoxicants आणि जुगार माध्यमातून आपण खुन्नस आणि द्वेष दरम्यान होऊ आणि अल्लाह आठवण आणि प्रार्थना आपण टाळू इच्छित आहे.

trans-unit.source: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger and beware. And if you turn away - then know that upon Our Messenger is only [the responsibility for] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: आणि अल्लाह पालन आणि मेसेंजर पालन करतात आणि सावध राहा.

trans-unit.source: There is not upon those who believe and do righteousness [any] blame concerning what they have eaten [in the past] if they [now] fear Allah and believe and do righteous deeds, and then fear Allah and believe, and then fear Allah and do good; and Allah loves the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह आणि अल्लाह विश्वास ठेवतात आणि ते [आता] तर अल्लाह भीती वाटते आणि विश्वास आणि धार्मिक कर्मे करू चांगुलपणा [कोणत्याही] दोष ते [पूर्वी] अन्न खाल्ले आहे काय यासंबंधी करू, आणि नंतर भीती वाटते आणि ते विश्वास, आणि नंतर भीती त्या यावर नाही आहे

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, Allah will surely test you through something of the game that your hands and spears [can] reach, that Allah may make evident those who fear Him unseen. And whoever transgresses after that - for him is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, अल्लाह तुम्हाला आपले हात आणि भाले [शकता] पोहोचू की खेळ काहीतरी चाचणी होईल अल्लाह स्पष्ट होऊ शकते, न पाहिलेला त्याला मान करतात.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not kill game while you are in the state of ihram. And whoever of you kills it intentionally - the penalty is an equivalent from sacrificial animals to what he killed, as judged by two just men among you as an offering [to Allah] delivered to the Ka'bah, or an expiation: the feeding of needy people or the equivalent of that in fasting, that he may taste the consequence of his deed. Allah has pardoned what is past; but whoever returns [to violation], then Allah will take retribution from him. And Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला, आपण ihram राज्यातील आहेत, तर खेळ किल नाही.

trans-unit.source: Lawful to you is game from the sea and its food as provision for you and the travelers, but forbidden to you is game from the land as long as you are in the state of ihram. And fear Allah to whom you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: आपण कायदेशीर समुद्र आणि आपण आणि यात्रिक साठी तरतूद अन्न पासून खेळ, पण निषिद्ध आपण जोपर्यंत आपण ihram राज्यातील आहेत म्हणून देशात खेळ आहे आहे.

trans-unit.source: Allah has made the Ka'bah, the Sacred House, standing for the people and [has sanctified] the sacred months and the sacrificial animals and the garlands [by which they are identified]. That is so you may know that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is in the earth and that Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह पवित्र महिने अर्पणे प्राणी आणि माळा, हार, [ते ओळखले जातात, जे] लोक उभे आणि [पवित्र आहे], Ka'bah, पवित्र हाऊस केले आहे.

trans-unit.source: Know that Allah is severe in penalty and that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह दंड आणि अल्लाह क्षमाशील आणि दयाळू आहे की गंभीर आहे.

trans-unit.source: Not upon the Messenger is [responsibility] except [for] notification. And Allah knows whatever you reveal and whatever you conceal.
trans-unit.target: मेसेंजर यावर नाही [जबाबदारी] [कारण] सूचना वगळता आहे.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Not equal are the evil and the good, although the abundance of evil might impress you." So fear Allah, O you of understanding, that you may be successful.
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "समान नाही वाईट भरपूर प्रमाणात असणे तुम्हाला प्रभावित तरी, चांगल्या आणि वाईट आहेत."

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not ask about things which, if they are shown to you, will distress you. But if you ask about them while the Qur'an is being revealed, they will be shown to you. Allah has pardoned that which is past; and Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: तू विश्वास ठेवला आहे, आपण दुःख होईल, ते आपण दर्शविले असेल तर, जे काही विचाराल नाही.

trans-unit.source: A people asked such [questions] before you; then they became thereby disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: लोक अशा [प्रश्न] आपण आधी जाण्यास सांगितले;

trans-unit.source: Allah has not appointed [such innovations as] bahirah or sa'ibah or wasilah or ham. But those who disbelieve invent falsehood about Allah, and most of them do not reason.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह bahirah किंवा sa'ibah किंवा wasilah किंवा हे ham [जसे नवकल्पना] नियुक्ती नाही.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Come to what Allah has revealed and to the Messenger," they say, "Sufficient for us is that upon which we found our fathers." Even though their fathers knew nothing, nor were they guided?
trans-unit.target: आणि तो त्यांना म्हणाला, आहे, "अल्लाह काय आले आहे आणि मेसेंजर ला ये," ते म्हणाले, "आम्हाला पुरेसा आम्ही यावर आमच्या पूर्वजांना आढळले आहे."

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, upon you is [responsibility for] yourselves. Those who have gone astray will not harm you when you have been guided. To Allah is you return all together; then He will inform you of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: तू कोण तुम्ही स्वत: [जबाबदारी] आहे यावर विश्वास ठेवला आहे.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, testimony [should be taken] among you when death approaches one of you at the time of bequest - [that of] two just men from among you or two others from outside if you are traveling through the land and the disaster of death should strike you. Detain them after the prayer and let them both swear by Allah if you doubt [their testimony, saying], "We will not exchange our oath for a price, even if he should be a near relative, and we will not withhold the testimony of Allah. Indeed, we would then be of the sinful."
trans-unit.target: मृत्यू वारसा वेळी एक पध्दती तेव्हा तू कोण, साक्ष विश्वास ठेवला आहे तुमच्यामध्ये [घेतले पाहिजे] - दोन फक्त बाहेरून दोन इतर आपण काही माणसे किंवा तुम्ही आपल्या देशात जाऊन माध्यमातून प्रवास करत असाल तर [की]

trans-unit.source: But if it is found that those two were guilty of perjury, let two others stand in their place [who are] foremost [in claim] from those who have a lawful right. And let them swear by Allah, "Our testimony is truer than their testimony, and we have not transgressed. Indeed, we would then be of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: तो सापडला तर त्या दोन खोटी साक्ष दोषी होते की, इतर दोन एक कायदेशीर हक्क आहे त्या पासून त्यांच्या जागी [आहेत] सर्वात [दावा] मध्ये उभे करू.

trans-unit.source: That is more likely that they will give testimony according to its [true] objective, or [at least] they would fear that [other] oaths might be taken after their oaths. And fear Allah and listen; and Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: की ते त्याच्या [खरे] उद्देश त्यानुसार साक्ष देऊ, किंवा [किमान] ते [इतर] शपथ त्यांच्या शपथ घेतली जाऊ शकते भय, असे अधिक शक्यता आहे.

trans-unit.source: [Be warned of] the Day when Allah will assemble the messengers and say, "What was the response you received?" They will say, "We have no knowledge. Indeed, it is You who is Knower of the unseen"
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह दूत एकत्र म्हणेल, तेव्हा दिवस आहे [चेतावनी जाऊ] "आपण प्राप्त प्रतिसाद काय होते?"

trans-unit.source: [The Day] when Allah will say, "O Jesus, Son of Mary, remember My favor upon you and upon your mother when I supported you with the Pure Spirit and you spoke to the people in the cradle and in maturity; and [remember] when I taught you writing and wisdom and the Torah and the Gospel; and when you designed from clay [what was] like the form of a bird with My permission, then you breathed into it, and it became a bird with My permission; and you healed the blind and the leper with My permission; and when you brought forth the dead with My permission; and when I restrained the Children of Israel from [killing] you when you came to them with clear proofs and those who disbelieved among them said, "This is not but obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: [दिवस] अल्लाह म्हणतील तेव्हा, "अहो येशू मरीया पुत्र माझी इच्छा तुम्हाला आणि आपल्या आई यावर शुद्ध आत्म्याने आपले समर्थन आणि आपण पाळणा आणि परिपक्वता लोकांना सांगितले लक्षात ठेवा आणि [लक्षात ठेवा

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when I inspired to the disciples, "Believe in Me and in My messenger Jesus." They said, "We have believed, so bear witness that indeed we are Muslims [in submission to Allah]."
trans-unit.target: आणि [लक्षात ठेवा] मी शिष्यांना प्रेरणा तेव्हा "मला आणि माझा दूत येशूवर विश्वास ठेव."

trans-unit.source: [And remember] when the disciples said, "O Jesus, Son of Mary, can your Lord send down to us a table [spread with food] from the heaven? [Jesus] said," Fear Allah, if you should be believers."
trans-unit.target: [आणि लक्षात ठेवा] शिष्य म्हणाला, "अहो येशू मरीया पुत्र आपल्या प्रभु खाली आम्हाला एक टेबल [अन्न प्रसार] स्वर्गातून पाठवू शकतो? [येशू] म्हणाला," तुम्ही विश्वासणारे हवे असेल तर, अल्लाह भीती वाटते.

trans-unit.source: They said, "We wish to eat from it and let our hearts be reassured and know that you have been truthful to us and be among its witnesses."
trans-unit.target: ते म्हणाले, "आम्ही खाऊ आणि आपल्या अंत: करणात साकारल्या आणि आपण आम्हाला खात्रीलायक केले आहे हे मला माहीत आहे आणि त्याच्या साक्षीदारांसमोर असू द्या इच्छा आहे."

trans-unit.source: Said Jesus, the son of Mary, "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table [spread with food] from the heaven to be for us a festival for the first of us and the last of us and a sign from You. And provide for us, and You are the best of providers."
trans-unit.target: येशू म्हणाला, मरीया मुलगा "अल्लाह, आमच्या परमेश्वरा, खाली आम्हाला एक टेबल [अन्न प्रसार] स्वर्गातून असल्याचे आम्हाला एक सण आम्हाला पहिल्या आणि आम्हाला शेवटच्या आणि एक चिन्ह आपण पाठवा

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "Indeed, I will sent it down to you, but whoever disbelieves afterwards from among you - then indeed will I punish him with a punishment by which I have not punished anyone among the worlds."
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह म्हणाला, "खरंच, मी तुला खाली पाठविली जातील, पण जो कोणी पासून नंतर disbelieves -. खरोखरच मी त्याला मी जगातील कोणी शिक्षा नाही ज्या द्वारे शिक्षा शिक्षा करीन"

trans-unit.source: And [beware the Day] when Allah will say, "O Jesus, Son of Mary, did you say to the people, 'Take me and my mother as deities besides Allah?'" He will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for me to say that to which I have no right. If I had said it, You would have known it. You know what is within myself, and I do not know what is within Yourself. Indeed, it is You who is Knower of the unseen.
trans-unit.target: आणि [दिवस स्वत: चे रक्षण] अल्लाह म्हणतील तेव्हा, "अहो येशू मरीया मानवपुत्रा, तू लोकांना सांगत नाही, 'मला आणि अल्लाह शिवाय? देवता म्हणून माझी आई घे" तो म्हणेल, "उंच आपण नाहीत! कारण तो होता

trans-unit.source: I said not to them except what You commanded me - to worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord. And I was a witness over them as long as I was among them; but when You took me up, You were the Observer over them, and You are, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह, माझा प्रभू आणि आपल्या प्रभु त्याचीच उपासना - मी तुझ्या आज्ञेचे काय वगळता नाही त्यांना म्हणाला,.

trans-unit.source: If You should punish them - indeed they are Your servants; but if You forgive them - indeed it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: आपण त्यांना शिक्षा, तर - खरंच ते आपले दास आहेत;

trans-unit.source: Allah will say, "This is the Day when the truthful will benefit from their truthfulness." For them are gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them, and they with Him. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह म्हणेल, "हा दिवस आहे खात्रीलायक त्यांच्या सत्यता पासून तेव्हा फायदा होईल."

trans-unit.source: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is within them. And He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह आकाशातील पराक्रम आणि पृथ्वी मालकीचे आहे आणि त्यांना आत जे काही आहे.

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth and made the darkness and the light. Then those who disbelieve equate [others] with their Lord.
trans-unit.target: [सर्व] स्तुती आकाश व पृथ्वी निर्माण आणि अंधार आणि प्रकाश केली अल्लाह ला [मुळे] आहे.

trans-unit.source: It is He who created you from clay and then decreed a term and a specified time [known] to Him; then [still] you are in dispute.
trans-unit.target: तो चिखल पासून आपण तयार आणि नंतर एक संज्ञा आणि ठराविक वेळी त्याला [ओळखले] आदेश दिला तो आहे;

trans-unit.source: And He is Allah, [the only deity] in the heavens and the earth. He knows your secret and what you make public, and He knows that which you earn.
trans-unit.target: आणि तो अल्लाह, [फक्त देवता] आकाश व पृथ्वी आहे.

trans-unit.source: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they turn away therefrom.
trans-unit.target: आणि कोणतेही चिन्ह ते पापात चालू वगळता त्यांच्या प्रभू चिन्हे त्यांना येतो.

trans-unit.source: For they had denied the truth when it came to them, but there is going to reach them the news of what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: ते सत्य नकार दिला होता त्यांच्यावर आले, तेव्हा पण त्यांना ते उपहास काय उपयोग बातमी पोहोचण्याचा जात आहे.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen how many generations We destroyed before them which We had established upon the earth as We have not established you? And We sent [rain from] the sky upon them in showers and made rivers flow beneath them; then We destroyed them for their sins and brought forth after them a generation of others.
trans-unit.target: ते किती अनेक पिढ्या आम्ही पृथ्वीवर पायावर आपण स्थापित केले नाही आहे म्हणून होते आम्ही त्यांना नेस्तनाबूत पाहिले नाही का?

trans-unit.source: And even if We had sent down to you, [O Muhammad], a written scripture on a page and they touched it with their hands, the disbelievers would say, "This is not but obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: आपण खाली पाठवले होते आणि जरी, [हे मुहम्मद], एक पृष्ठ वर लेखी पवित्र शास्त्र सांगते आणि त्यांनी तो स्पर्श केला disbelievers तर म्हणेन की "हे पण स्पष्ट जादू नाही."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why was there not sent down to him an angel?" But if We had sent down an angel, the matter would have been decided; then they would not be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: आणि ते म्हणाले, "का ते त्याला तिथे भेटायला पाठविले एक देवदूत नाही का?"

trans-unit.source: And if We had made him an angel, We would have made him [appear as] a man, and We would have covered them with that in which they cover themselves.
trans-unit.target: आणि आम्ही त्याला एक देवदूत बनवले असते तर, आम्ही केले असते त्याला एक माणूस [म्हणून दिसतात], आणि आम्ही ते स्वत: झाकून ज्या त्यांना संरक्षित आहे.

trans-unit.source: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by that which they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: आणि आधीच आपण आधी थट्टा दूत होते, पण त्यांची हेटाळणी केली जे ते उपहास वापरले जे की enveloped होते.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "जमीन माध्यमातून प्रवास, मग पुन्हा deniers शेवटी कसे होते देखणे."

trans-unit.source: Say, "To whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth?" Say, "To Allah." He has decreed upon Himself mercy. He will surely assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt. Those who will lose themselves [that Day] do not believe.
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "कोणाला आकाश व पृथ्वी जे आहे मालकीचे?"

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs that which reposes by night and by day, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: आणि त्याला रात्री व दिवसा reposes जे मालकीचे, आणि तो ऐकतो, जाणून आहे.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Is it other than Allah I should take as a protector, Creator of the heavens and the earth, while it is He who feeds and is not fed?" Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to be the first [among you] who submit [to Allah] and [was commanded], 'Do not ever be of the polytheists.' "
trans-unit.target: "तो जो फीड आणि दिले नाही आहे, तर ती अल्लाह व्यतिरिक्त इतर मी एक रक्षक म्हणून घ्यावे स्वर्ग व पृथ्वीचा निर्माणकर्ता?" म्हणतात,

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "मी माझ्या प्रभु, एक प्रचंड दिवस शिक्षा आज्ञा न मानणारे पाहिजे असेल तर पाहा, मी उपासना करतो."

trans-unit.source: He from whom it is averted that Day - [Allah] has granted him mercy. And that is the clear attainment.
trans-unit.target: ज्यांना तो आहे हे दिवस averted आहे - [अल्लाह] त्याला दया दिली आहे.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him. And if He touches you with good - then He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: आणि अल्लाह संकटांनी तुम्ही हात लावू नये, तर त्याला जर नाही remover आहे.

trans-unit.source: And He is the subjugator over His servants. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted [with all].
trans-unit.target: आणि तो त्याच्या सेवकांना प्रती subjugator आहे.

trans-unit.source: Say, "What thing is greatest in testimony?" Say, "Allah is witness between me and you. And this Qur'an was revealed to me that I may warn you thereby and whomever it reaches. Do you [truly] testify that with Allah there are other deities?" Say, "I will not testify [with you]." Say, "Indeed, He is but one God, and indeed, I am free of what you associate [with Him]."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "काय चालले साक्ष महान कोण?"

trans-unit.source: Those to whom We have given the Scripture recognize it as they recognize their [own] sons. Those who will lose themselves [in the Hereafter] do not believe.
trans-unit.target: ज्यांना आम्ही ते त्यांच्या [स्वत: च्या] मुले ओळखायला म्हणून पवित्र शास्त्र तो ओळखत दिली आहे.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie or denies His verses? Indeed, the wrongdoers will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: आणि कोण खोटे अल्लाह बद्दल invents किंवा त्याच्या अध्याय नाकारतो एकापेक्षा अधिक अन्यायी आहे?

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will gather them all together; then We will say to those who associated others with Allah, "Where are your 'partners' that you used to claim [with Him]?"
trans-unit.target: आणि [उल्लेख देवा, मुहम्मद], दिवस आम्ही सर्व एकत्र गोळा करीन;

trans-unit.source: Then there will be no [excuse upon] examination except they will say, "By Allah, our Lord, we were not those who associated."
trans-unit.target: नंतर, नाही [निमित्त यावर] परीक्षा ते म्हणतील वगळता होईल "अल्लाह आपल्या प्रभु, आम्ही संबंधित ज्यांना होते नाही."

trans-unit.source: See how they will lie about themselves. And lost from them will be what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: ते स्वत: खोटे होईल ते पाहू.

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who listen to you, but We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And if they should see every sign, they will not believe in it. Even when they come to you arguing with you, those who disbelieve say, "This is not but legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: आणि त्यापैकी तुमचे ऐकणार कोण त्या आहेत, पण आम्ही त्यांना कान बहिरेपणा, ते समजून नये, त्यांच्या अंत: करणात पांघरुणे नेमले आहे.

trans-unit.source: And they prevent [others] from him and are [themselves] remote from him. And they do not destroy except themselves, but they perceive [it] not.
trans-unit.target: मग ते त्याला [इतर] प्रतिबंध आणि दूरस्थ त्याला [स्वत:] आहेत.

trans-unit.source: If you could but see when they are made to stand before the Fire and will say, "Oh, would that we could be returned [to life on earth] and not deny the signs of our Lord and be among the believers."
trans-unit.target: आपण "आम्ही [पृथ्वीवर] परत असे जाऊ शकते आणि आपल्या प्रभु चिन्हे नाकारावे आणि विश्वास ठेवणारे येणार नाही अरे,." शक्य झाले पण ते फायर उभे आणि तुम्हांला म्हणेल, केले जातात, तेव्हा दिसत असेल तर

trans-unit.source: But what they concealed before has [now] appeared to them. And even if they were returned, they would return to that which they were forbidden; and indeed, they are liars.
trans-unit.target: पण काय ते आधी दृष्टीस [आता] त्यांना दिसू लागले आहे.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "There is none but our worldly life, and we will not be resurrected."
trans-unit.target: आणि ते म्हणाले, "आमच्या ऐहिक जीवन पण कोणीही नाही, आणि आम्ही पुनरुत्थान केले जाणार नाही."

trans-unit.source: If you could but see when they will be made to stand before their Lord. He will say, "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will [then] say, "So taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve."
trans-unit.target: असेल तर, तुम्हाला शक्य झाले पण ते परमेश्वरासमोर उभे केले जाईल तेव्हा पाहू.

trans-unit.source: Those will have lost who deny the meeting with Allah, until when the Hour [of resurrection] comes upon them unexpectedly, they will say, "Oh, [how great is] our regret over what we neglected concerning it," while they bear their burdens on their backs. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह बैठक म्हणणारे गमावले आहेत होईल, तास [पुनरुत्थान] अनपेक्षितपणे त्यांना शिक्षा येतो तेव्हा होईपर्यंत ते म्हणतील, "अरे, [किती महान आहे] आम्ही यासंबंधी दुर्लक्ष काय आमच्या दु: ख," ते सहन करताना त्यांच्या

trans-unit.source: And the worldly life is not but amusement and diversion; but the home of the Hereafter is best for those who fear Allah, so will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: व ऐहिक जीवन पण मनोरंजन आणि फेरफार नाही;

trans-unit.source: We know that you, [O Muhammad], are saddened by what they say. And indeed, they do not call you untruthful, but it is the verses of Allah that the wrongdoers reject.
trans-unit.target: आपण, [तू मुहम्मद], ते काय बोलतात ते करून तानाजी पडल्याची बातमी मिळाली आहेत हे मला माहीत.

trans-unit.source: And certainly were messengers denied before you, but they were patient over [the effects of] denial, and they were harmed until Our victory came to them. And none can alter the words of Allah. And there has certainly come to you some information about the [previous] messengers.
trans-unit.target: आणि खुपच दूत तुम्ही नाकारला होते, पण ते नकार [परिणाम] धीराने, आणि आमच्या विजयाने येईपर्यंत ते दुखापत होते.

trans-unit.source: And if their evasion is difficult for you, then if you are able to seek a tunnel into the earth or a stairway into the sky to bring them a sign, [then do so]. But if Allah had willed, He would have united them upon guidance. So never be of the ignorant.
trans-unit.target: आणि त्यांच्या चुकवणे आपण कठीण आहे तर मग आपण त्यांना अशी खूण आणण्यासाठी आकाश मध्ये पृथ्वीवर एक डोंगर किंवा जीना शोधण्यात सक्षम आहेत तर, [नंतर तसे].

trans-unit.source: Only those who hear will respond. But the dead - Allah will resurrect them; then to Him they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: फक्त प्रतिसाद देईल जे ऐकतात.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "Indeed, Allah is Able to send down a sign, but most of them do not know."
trans-unit.target: आणि ते म्हणाले, "एक चिन्ह आपल्या प्रभु त्याला खाली पाठविला गेला नाही का?"

trans-unit.source: And there is no creature on [or within] the earth or bird that flies with its wings except [that they are] communities like you. We have not neglected in the Register a thing. Then unto their Lord they will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: आणि [जण असे आहेत की] आपण जसे समुदाय वगळता त्याच्या पंख मार्गाने पृथ्वी किंवा पक्षी वर [किंवा आत] कोणतीही अशी निर्मित गोष्ट आहे.

trans-unit.source: But those who deny Our verses are deaf and dumb within darknesses. Whomever Allah wills - He leaves astray; and whomever He wills - He puts him on a straight path.
trans-unit.target: पण आमच्या अध्याय म्हणणारे आणि बहिरा darknesses आत मुका आहे.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if there came to you the punishment of Allah or there came to you the Hour - is it other than Allah you would invoke, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: जसे की, "तू लक्ष देत होतास: अल्लाह शिक्षा तुम्ही आले किंवा तास आपण तेथे आला तर - तो अल्लाह व्यतिरिक्त इतर आपण चालू करतात, त्यांनी होईल, आपण खात्रीलायक हवे असेल तर आहे का?"

trans-unit.source: No, it is Him [alone] you would invoke, and He would remove that for which you invoked Him if He willed, and you would forget what you associate [with Him].
trans-unit.target: [फक्त] आपण चालू करतात, त्यांनी नाही, तो त्याला आहे, आणि तो निग्रही वृत्तीचा तर जे आपण त्याला विनंती केली की दूर होईल, आणि आपण [त्याला] संबद्ध काय विसरू होईल.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent [messengers] to nations before you, [O Muhammad]; then We seized them with poverty and hardship that perhaps they might humble themselves [to Us].
trans-unit.target: आणि आम्ही आधीच [दूत] पाठविले आहे राष्ट्रांना आपण आधी, [हे मुहम्मद];

trans-unit.source: Then why, when Our punishment came to them, did they not humble themselves? But their hearts became hardened, and Satan made attractive to them that which they were doing.
trans-unit.target: मग, आमच्या शिक्षा त्यांना आले, तेव्हा त्यांना नम्र होऊन नाही?

trans-unit.source: So when they forgot that by which they had been reminded, We opened to them the doors of every [good] thing until, when they rejoiced in that which they were given, We seized them suddenly, and they were [then] in despair.
trans-unit.target: म्हणून ते त्यांनी स्वत: आठवण आले होते की विसरले, तेव्हा आम्ही त्यांना प्रत्येक [चांगला] गोष्ट दरवाजे पर्यंत ते फार आनंदित तेव्हा ते देण्यात आले निराशा उघडलेले आम्ही अचानक त्यांना अटक केली व ते [नंतर] होते.

trans-unit.source: So the people that committed wrong were eliminated. And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे चुकीच्या पाप लोक वगळण्यात आले.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should take away your hearing and your sight and set a seal upon your hearts, which deity other than Allah could bring them [back] to you?" Look how we diversify the verses; then they [still] turn away.
trans-unit.target: जसे की, ": अल्लाह पेक्षा इतर देवता त्यांना [परत] आपण आणण्यासाठी अल्लाह आपल्या सुनावणी आणि आपल्या दृष्टीने घेऊन आपली अंत: करणे यावर एक सील सेट पाहिजे असेल तर तू लक्ष देत होतास?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if the punishment of Allah should come to you unexpectedly or manifestly, will any be destroyed but the wrongdoing people?"
trans-unit.target: जसे की, ": अल्लाह शिक्षा अनपेक्षितपणे किंवा स्पष्टपणे तुम्हाला आला, तर विरुद्ध काही चुकीच्या गोष्टी लोक कोणत्याही नाश होईल पण आपण विचार केला तर?"

trans-unit.source: And We send not the messengers except as bringers of good tidings and warners. So whoever believes and reforms - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: आणि आम्ही चांगली बातमी आणि warners च्या bringers वगळता नाही दूत पाठवून.

trans-unit.source: But those who deny Our verses - the punishment will touch them for their defiant disobedience.
trans-unit.target: पण आमच्या अध्याय म्हणणारे - शिक्षा त्यांच्या उर्मट देवाच्या आज्ञा पाळीत नाहीत त्यांना स्पर्श होईल.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not tell you that I have the depositories [containing the provision] of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel. I only follow what is revealed to me." Say, "Is the blind equivalent to the seeing? Then will you not give thought?"
trans-unit.target: त्यांना सांग, '[हे मुहम्मद], "मी तुम्हाला मी अल्लाह किंवा मी न पाहिलेला माहीत आहे, किंवा मी तुम्हांला सांगतो की, मी एक देवदूत आहे की करू की [तरतूद असलेले] डिपॉझिटरीज आहे की सांगू नका. मी फक्त प्रगट झाले आहे काय

trans-unit.source: And warn by the Qur'an those who fear that they will be gathered before their Lord - for them besides Him will be no protector and no intercessor - that they might become righteous.
trans-unit.target: त्याला नाही रक्षण नाही आणि intercessor असेल याशिवाय त्यांना - - ते चांगल्या व्हावे आणि कुराण करून उपासना करतात ते त्यांच्या परमेश्वर एकत्र जमतील त्या चेतावणी.

trans-unit.source: And do not send away those who call upon their Lord morning and afternoon, seeking His countenance. Not upon you is anything of their account and not upon them is anything of your account. So were you to send them away, you would [then] be of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: त्याचा चेहरा शोधत त्यांचा प्रभू सकाळी व दुपारी हाक जे, दूर पाठवू नका.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have tried some of them through others that the disbelievers might say, "Is it these whom Allah has favored among us?" Is not Allah most knowing of those who are grateful?
trans-unit.target: आणि अशा प्रकारे आम्ही त्यांना इतर काही जणांना माध्यमातून disbelievers म्हणेल की, प्रयत्न केला आहे "ज्या अल्लाह आम्हाला आपापसांत दिला आहे हे आहे का?"

trans-unit.source: And when those come to you who believe in Our verses, say, "Peace be upon you. Your Lord has decreed upon Himself mercy: that any of you who does wrong out of ignorance and then repents after that and corrects himself - indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: आणि तेव्हा तुमच्याकडे येईन त्या आमच्या अध्याय विश्वास ठेवतो, की, "तुम्हांस शांति असो यावर असू आपले प्रभु स्वत: यावर हुकूम आहे दया. अज्ञान पाप करतो आणि नंतर कोण तुला काही नंतर पश्चात्ताप आणि स्वत: ला ताळ्यावर आणतो, की - खरंच, तो

trans-unit.source: And thus do We detail the verses, and [thus] the way of the criminals will become evident.
trans-unit.target: आणि अशा प्रकारे आम्ही तपशील अध्याय, आणि [अशा प्रकारे] गुन्हेगार मार्ग स्पष्ट होईल.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you invoke besides Allah." Say, "I will not follow your desires, for I would then have gone astray, and I would not be of the [rightly] guided."
trans-unit.target: जसे की, "खरंच, मी आपण अल्लाह याशिवाय चालू करतात, त्यांनी त्या देवाची पूजा करण्यासाठी मना केले आहे."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, I am on clear evidence from my Lord, and you have denied it. I do not have that for which you are impatient. The decision is only for Allah. He relates the truth, and He is the best of deciders."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "खरंच, मी माझ्या प्रभु स्पष्ट पुरावा आहे, आणि आपण तो नाकारला आहे. मी जे आपण अधीर आहेत की नाहीत. निर्णय फक्त अल्लाह आहे. सत्य संबंधित, आणि तो deciders उत्तम आहे

trans-unit.source: Say, "If I had that for which you are impatient, the matter would have been decided between me and you, but Allah is most knowing of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "मी जे आपण अधीर, या प्रकरणाची तुम्हाला व मला निर्णय घेतला की असता, पण अल्लाह त्या दुष्टांच्या सर्वात जाणून आहे होते, तर."

trans-unit.source: And with Him are the keys of the unseen; none knows them except Him. And He knows what is on the land and in the sea. Not a leaf falls but that He knows it. And no grain is there within the darknesses of the earth and no moist or dry [thing] but that it is [written] in a clear record.
trans-unit.target: आणि त्याच्याबरोबर न पाहिलेला किल्ल्या आहेत;

trans-unit.source: And it is He who takes your souls by night and knows what you have committed by day. Then He revives you therein that a specified term may be fulfilled. Then to Him will be your return; then He will inform you about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: आणि तो रात्री तुमच्या जीवनाचा घेते आणि आपण दिवसा पाप केले आहे काय माहीत कोण तो आहे.

trans-unit.source: And He is the subjugator over His servants, and He sends over you guardian-angels until, when death comes to one of you, Our messengers take him, and they do not fail [in their duties].
trans-unit.target: आणि तो त्याच्या सेवकांना प्रती subjugator आहे, आणि तो आपल्याला पालक-देवदूत तोपर्यंत त्यांना मरणाचा, आपण एक येतो तेव्हा आमच्या दूत त्याला घेऊन [त्यांच्या कर्तव्ये मध्ये] पाठवतो, आणि ते अपयशी नाही.

trans-unit.source: Then they His servants are returned to Allah, their true Lord. Unquestionably, His is the judgement, and He is the swiftest of accountants.
trans-unit.target: मग ते त्याचे सेवक अल्लाह, त्यांचे खरे प्रभु परत आला आहात.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who rescues you from the darknesses of the land and sea [when] you call upon Him imploring [aloud] and privately, 'If He should save us from this [crisis], we will surely be among the thankful.' "
trans-unit.target: [तेव्हा] आपण त्याला याचना [मोठ्याने] आणि एकांतात हाक म्हणा, "जमीन आणि समुद्राच्या darknesses पासून तू कोण आणि समूह, 'तो या [संकट] आम्हाला वाचव असे वाटत असेल, आपण खात्रीने आभारी राहीन.'

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is Allah who saves you from it and from every distress; then you [still] associate others with Him."
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "हे आणि प्रत्येक दुःख आपण मदत करतो कोण अल्लाह आहे. त्याला नंतर आपण [अद्याप] सहकारी इतरांना"

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is the [one] Able to send upon you affliction from above you or from beneath your feet or to confuse you [so you become] sects and make you taste the violence of one another." Look how We diversify the signs that they might understand.
trans-unit.target: त्यांना सांग, ' "तो [एक] संप्रदाय [त्यामुळे आपण बनू] आणि तुम्ही एकमेकांवर हिंसक चव करा आपण वरील किंवा आपल्या पायाखालून किंवा आपण चुकीचा आहे असे सिद्ध पासून दु: ख पाठवू समर्थ आहे."

trans-unit.source: But your people have denied it while it is the truth. Say, "I am not over you a manager."
trans-unit.target: पण तुझ्या लोकांचा सत्य आहे, तर ते नाकारले आहे.

trans-unit.source: For every happening is a finality; and you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: प्रत्येक घटना एक अंतिमत्व आहे;

trans-unit.source: And when you see those who engage in [offensive] discourse concerning Our verses, then turn away from them until they enter into another conversation. And if Satan should cause you to forget, then do not remain after the reminder with the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: आणि आपण आमच्या अध्याय यासंबंधी [आक्षेपार्ह] प्रवचन व्यस्त ज्यांना पाहाल, तेव्हा ते दुसऱ्या संभाषण प्रवेश होईपर्यंत त्यांना सोडून चालू.

trans-unit.source: And those who fear Allah are not held accountable for the disbelievers at all, but [only for] a reminder - that perhaps they will fear Him.
trans-unit.target: आणि अल्लाह भीती ज्यांनी सर्व disbelievers जबाबदार धरण्यात नाहीत, पण [फक्त] एक स्मरणपत्र - कदाचित ते त्याला मान होईल.

trans-unit.source: And leave those who take their religion as amusement and diversion and whom the worldly life has deluded. But remind with the Qur'an, lest a soul be given up to destruction for what it earned; it will have other than Allah no protector and no intercessor. And if it should offer every compensation, it would not be taken from it. Those are the ones who are given to destruction for what they have earned. For them will be a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment because they used to disbelieve.
trans-unit.target: आणि कोण करमणूक आणि फेरफार आणि ज्यांना ऐहिक जीवन फसवणूक आहे त्यांच्या धर्म घेऊन त्या सोडा.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Shall we invoke instead of Allah that which neither benefits us nor harms us and be turned back on our heels after Allah has guided us? [We would then be] like one whom the devils enticed [to wander] upon the earth confused, [while] he has companions inviting him to guidance, [calling], 'Come to us.' " Say, "Indeed, the guidance of Allah is the [only] guidance; and we have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: म्हणा, "आम्ही आपल्याला हानी किंवा जे दोन्हीपैकी फायदे आणि अल्लाह आम्हाला मार्गदर्शन केल्यानंतर मागे वळून आमचे पाय घट्ट देण्याची त्याऐवजी अल्लाह चालू करतात, त्यांनी का? यासारख्या [मग आम्ही होईल] तू भुते तसे करण्यास भाग पाडले [बहकणे] पृथ्वी गोंधळून यावर

trans-unit.source: And to establish prayer and fear Him." And it is He to whom you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: आणि प्रार्थना स्थापन करण्यासाठी आणि त्याच्याबद्दल आदर बाळगा. "आणि तो आपल्याला एकत्र जमतील ज्यांना तो आहे.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the heavens and earth in truth. And the day He says, "Be," and it is, His word is the truth. And His is the dominion [on] the Day the Horn is blown. [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed; and He is the Wise, the Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: आणि तो सत्यात आकाश व पृथ्वी निर्माण तो आहे.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father Azar, "Do you take idols as deities? Indeed, I see you and your people to be in manifest error."
trans-unit.target: आणि [उल्लेख देवा, मुहम्मद] अब्राहामाने आपल्या आजार म्हणाली, "आपण मूर्ती देवता म्हणून कल्पना आहे का? खरंच, मी तुम्हाला आणि तुमच्या लोक स्पष्ट त्रुटी असल्याचे दिसेल."

trans-unit.source: And thus did We show Abraham the realm of the heavens and the earth that he would be among the certain [in faith]
trans-unit.target: आणि अशा प्रकारे आम्ही अब्राहाम आकाशातील क्षेत्र आणि तो [विश्वासात] काही लोकांमध्ये होईल पृथ्वी दाखवा केले

trans-unit.source: So when the night covered him [with darkness], he saw a star. He said, "This is my lord." But when it set, he said, "I like not those that disappear."
trans-unit.target: त्यामुळे रात्री त्याला झाकून तेव्हा [अंधार] तो एक तारा पाहिले.

trans-unit.source: And when he saw the moon rising, he said, "This is my lord." But when it set, he said, "Unless my Lord guides me, I will surely be among the people gone astray."
trans-unit.target: आणि तो चंद्र वाढत्या पाहिले, तेव्हा तो म्हणाला, "हा माझा प्रभु आहे."

trans-unit.source: And when he saw the sun rising, he said, "This is my lord; this is greater." But when it set, he said, "O my people, indeed I am free from what you associate with Allah.
trans-unit.target: आणि त्याला पाहिले तेव्हा तो सूर्य उगवतो तो म्हणाला, "हा माझा स्वामी आहे; हे महान आहे."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have turned my face toward He who created the heavens and the earth, inclining toward truth, and I am not of those who associate others with Allah."
